materialSearchInput.error: Please enter the name of an item

menu.whatDoYouWantToDo: What do you want to do?

container.residualWasteDescription: This is the waste that is left once the recyclable materials have been separated. Even if you are excellent at recycling, you will still have some residual waste left over.

error.title: Something’s gone wrong!
error.message: Our team has been notified about this issue.
error.label: Let’s have another go...

title.default: Sorry, we couldn’t find that location.
title.notInTheUK: Sorry, this service isn’t available in your area.

notFound.ukOnly: The data in this tool only covers mainland regions of the UK.
notFound.label: Try another location?

aside.content: Recycling information is available elsewhere for these UK regions:

about.title: About this service
about.intro: Powered by RecycleNow.com, this tool can be used to search and find recycling locations throughout the United Kingdom.

becomeAPartner.title: Add this tool to your website
becomeAPartner.description: It’s been created as an embeddable widget that can be added to any website to help visitors discover more recycling options. For example, a beverage manufacturer could use the tool to show places to recycle drinks cans.

feedback.title: Improving this service
feedback.description: We’re always looking to improve this tool and would be interested to hear about your experience whilst using it, good or bad.

list: see your nearest places to recycle
find out how to recycle a specific item
check what you can recycle at home

homeRecycling.title: Find out what you can recycle from home.

postcode.title: What do you need to recycle?

noProperties.title: This item cannot be recycled at home
noProperties.content: Check what you can put in your home recycling bins and if you have a food and garden waste collection.

manyProperties.title: Recycle at home
manyProperties.collectionSome: This item is collected from <bold>some properties</bold> in the area.
manyProperties.collectionAll: This item is collected from <bold>all properties</bold> in the area.

oneProperty.title: Recycle at home
oneProperty.collection_one: This item is collected in this bin:
oneProperty.collection_other: This item is collected in these bins:

noPlaces.title: There are no nearby places to recycle this item.
noPlaces.content: No places within 25 miles of {{ postcode }}

places.title: Recycle at a nearby place
places.content_one: This item can be recycled at <bold>1 place</bold> in the area.
places.content_other: This item can be recycled at <bold>{{count}} places</bold> in the area.
places.contentThirtyPlus: This item can be recycled at 30+ places in the area.

search.notFound: We couldn’t find a match for
search.help: Try using an alternative name for it, or search for a similar item or material.

error.message: An unexpected error occurred whilst searching for places to recycle this item.

aside.paragraph: Contact this service provider if you need to:
list: Arrange collection of large or bulky items

collections.title: Check what you can put in your home recycling.
collections.help: Select your bin to see collection details.

search.label: Check what goes in each bin
search.positive_one: Yes, it can be recycled in the following bin...
search.positive_other: Yes, it can be recycled in the following bin...
search.negative: No, it can’t be recycled in the following bins...

hwrc.title: Take items to a Recycling Centre in your area.
hwrc.info: Some Recycling Centres are open to local residents only. Please check before you make your journey.

contact.title: Find more information about the services in your area.

notes.title: Notes
notes.paragraphOne: Please contact your council if you:
list: are unsure which one to use
notes.paragraphTwo: They will also be able to tell you when each collection is scheduled.

places.count_zero: No places within 25 miles match this search
